channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Want Better Republicans? Stop Sitting Out Primaries
item.description: The GOP establishment knows it can get away with betraying conservative priorities because Republican voters let them do it.

item.title: How A Handful Of Grassroots Groups Built The Ground Game Critical To Trump’s Victory
item.description: American Majority Action turned out low-participation voters in battleground States to help Trump and fellow Republicans to victory.

item.title: Trump senior adviser Dan Scavino fuels speculation about a congressional run in N.Y.
item.description: A longtime senior adviser to President-elect Donald Trump is wondering aloud about running for the House seat that Rep. Elise Stefanik will vacate whe...

item.title: From CDC to labor secretary: See Trump's top picks for Cabinet roles
item.description: Trump announced a slew of cabinet announcement on Friday as he begins to shape his Cabinet for his second term.

item.title: Why We Love Rockets
item.description: SpaceX is bringing an appropriate sense of brio to one of mankind’s coolest ventures.

item.title: Trump nominates Rep. Lori Chavez-DeRemer as secretary of labor
item.description: President-elect Trump has nominated Congresswoman Lori Chavez-DeRemer for secretary of labor as he continues to form his Cabinet.

item.title: The Week: Gaetz Goes Down
item.description: Plus: It is time for the U.S. government to take decisive action against the International Criminal Court.

item.title: The Case for a Smarter Antitrust Policy
item.description: By restoring clarity and rigor to antitrust enforcement, the incoming administration can protect competition without punishing success.

item.title: Trump names Gorka to White House counter-terror post, picks Scott Turner to lead HUD
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is bringing back Sebastian Gorka into the White House to serve as deputy assistant to the president and senior director f...

item.title: Adultery no longer a crime in New York as governor signs repeal of 1907 law
item.description: New York repealed on Friday a seldom-used law over a century old that made it a crime to cheat on your spouse - a misdemeanor that once could have lan...

item.title: The Witness of Jimmy Lai
item.description: Lai’s resistance to Chinese tyranny is the stuff of martyrs and saints, and it’s the stuff all the totalitarian muscle in the world cannot squash.

item.title: Trump brings back former aide Sebastian Gorka, ex-State Department official Alex Wong to serve in admin
item.description: Two former aides under President-elect Trump will return to the White House to serve under him for a second term, he announced on Friday.

item.title: Trump picks Dr. Marty Makary as Food and Drug Administration commissioner
item.description: President-elect Trump announced on Friday that he is nominating Dr. Marty Makary, a Johns Hopkins School of Medicine professor, to head the Food and D...

item.title: Trump fills key health care positions: surgeon general, heads of CDC, FDA
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is building out his health team, announcing that he will nominate Dr. Janette Nesheiwat to be Surgeon General.

item.title: Oregon DMV Busted Allowing People Of ‘Unknown Citizenship’ To Register To Vote
item.description: Under this system, the Oregon DMV has processed more than 54,600 voter registrations for individuals who have not proven citizenship, according to doc...

item.title: The Trump GOP’s Split Personalities
item.description: The incoming administration seems torn between two very different outlooks on government.

item.title: MSNBC’s Repeated Sympathy For Laken Riley’s Killer Shows You Don’t Hate Corporate Media Enough
item.description: MSNBC said 'Laken Riley's killer never stood a chance.' This is just the latest example of the outlet failing its readers.

item.title: Trump picks Scott Turner as secretary for Department of Housing and Urban Development
item.description: President-elect Trump nominated former NFL cornerback Scott Turner and Texas state representative as the secretary of the Department of Housing and Ur...

item.title: Trump names Bessent as Treasury secretary, Vought to lead OMB
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump filled two key spots to help carry out his economic agenda with the selection of financier Scott Bessent as the next Trea...

item.title: Report: Planned Parenthood Sold Murdered Babies To California School To Experiment On Their 23-Week-Old Bodies
item.description: Planned Parenthood has been providing “viable nonanomalous” babies murdered in “elective abortions” to the University of California San Diego (UCSD) f...
